title: Can A Gangster Quit?
alternative_title: 조폭도 퇴사가 되나요?; Can a Gangster Leave the Gang?; Гангстеры тоже уходят в отставку
status: 조폭도 퇴사가 되나요?; Can a Gangster Leave the Gang?; Гангстеры тоже уходят в отставку
description:
Description :
        Hyongwon, a member of the Viper Syndicate, flees the organization and escapes overseas. Facing an uncertain future, Hyongwon unexpectedly has a one-night stand with Seongjin whom he meets at a bar... But who exactly is Seongjin?Read Can a gangster quit? on mangabuddy+
